item.title: Write Your Own Proof-of-Work Blockchain
item.description: This article will teach you how to write a tiny proof-of-work blockchain, focusing on the Bitcoin implementation.

item.title: text2image
item.description: Render text to images with this tiny command line tool.

item.title: Think in Math. Write in Code.
item.description: The natural language which has been effectively used for thinking about computation, for thousands of years, is mathematics.

item.title: Notes On Vector Libraries
item.description: A good vector math library is essential for graphics and simulation programming.
